history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_finite_lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_finite_lim_correct,is_lim_unique.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_finite_lim f x <-> ex_lim f x /\\ is_finite (Lim f x)" on hypothesis of type "is_lim f x l".
Unable to find an instance for the variable P.

Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> Lim f x = l" on hypothesis of type "forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> is_finite (Lim f x) -> ex_finite_lim f x".
Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros H. apply ex_finite_lim_correct in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply is_lim_unique in H1. rewrite <- H1. apply Lim_correct. apply H1.
